name: Forecourt terms for Fuelling when user not enrolled to pbp
description: Forecourt terms for Fuelling when user is not enrolled to PBP
descriptionHtml: Forecourt terms for Fuelling when user is not enrolled to PBP

steps.name: I make api request to store id "0" with plate ""

testStage.description: Forecourt terms for Fuelling when user is not enrolled to PBP

steps.name: I check that the "Welcome Screen" is displayed
I click on "GET STARTED" button
I check that the "Choose Data Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "ALLOW ALL TRACKING" button
I check that the "First SignIn Screen" is displayed
I click on "PHONE NUMBER PREFIX" button
I check that the "All Country List Pane" is displayed
I enter the country name "Poland" in the search box
I click on "DISPLAYED COUNTRY" button
I click on "PHONE NUMBER" input
I enter the phone number "731731000" in the input
I click on "LET'S GO" button
I check that the "Password Screen" is displayed
I click on "PASSWORD" input
I enter the password "#Test123" in the input
I click on "SIGN IN" button
I check that the "Notification Permission Screen" is displayed
I click on "CONTINUE" button
I check that the "Location Permission Flow Screen" is displayed
I click on "CONTINUE" button
I close "Tell Us What You Think Pane"
I skip linking my card
I handle"Stay Informed About Offers Pane" marketing consent
I accept "Stay Informed About Offers Pane" marketing consent
I click on "MAYBE LATER" button
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I check that the location services are enabled on real device
I check that the "Enable location" warning is displayed
I check that the "We can't find you" text is displayed
I mock the location of the device to "SWEDEN_20888"
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Profile" tab is displayed
I click on "BUILD NUMBER" tab
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I enter the location data of the "SWEDEN_20888" station
I check "Set Location" page is visible
I enter the site ID "SWEDEN_20888" in the input
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I click on "Car Wash" advertisement
I check if "Car Wash" advertisement is displayed
I close and open application
I make sure that the location is set correctly
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "WALLET" tab
I check that the "Wallet Screen" is displayed
I click on "ADD PAYMENT" button
I check that the "Terms & Conditions Pane" is displayed
I get the text from the top text area on the "TOS Pane"
I check that the application text: "Accept our terms and conditions" is equals to expected value: "Accept our terms and conditions"
I click on "Close" button
I click on "BACK" button
I click on "HOME" button
I click on "BUY FUEL" tab
I click on Pay for Fuel "ENTER PUMP NUMBER" button
I check that the "Terms & Conditions Pane" is displayed
I get the text from the top text area on the "TOS Pane"
I check that the application text: "Accept our terms and conditions" is equals to expected value: "Accept our terms and conditions"
I click on "Close" button
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I click on "PAY BY PLATE" tab
I check that the "Add License Plate Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Terms of Use" message is displayed
I get the text from the "TOS" checkbox

I check that the application text: "By completing this sign up, you are agreeing to these Terms Of Use for Pay By Plate." is equals to expected value: "By completing this sign up, you are agreeing to these Terms Of Use for Pay By Plate."

parameters.value: By completing this sign up, you are agreeing to these Terms Of Use for Pay By Plate.

parameters.name: Expected:
parameters.value: By completing this sign up, you are agreeing to these Terms Of Use for Pay By Plate.

steps.name: I enter the plate number "SE39jlkl" in the input
I click on "COUNTRY" button
